title: Apple Fridge Storage Duration

items.name: Apples in the fridge
items.details: Last about 4-6 weeks, sometimes up to 2 months if stored properly.

items.name: Storage conditions
items.details: Keep in a cool, slightly humid environment.

items.name: Odor absorption
items.details: Avoid storing near strong-smelling foods as apples can absorb odors.

notes: Proper storage is key to maximizing shelf life.
